pages.text: $(li)The Crystal Chest is a upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:utility/iron_chest/diamond_chest)Diamond Chest$(/l).$(br)$(li)They have the same capacity of the Diamond Chests, 108 slots, but Crystal Chests allows the visualization of stored items.
$(li)A Diamond Chest can be upgraded to a Crystal Chest.$(br)$(li)Just right click it while you have one Diamond to Crystal Chest Upgrade on your hand.
pages.title: Crystal Chest Upgrade
